org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote

Class RemoteField<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote.RemoteField<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type the the field
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkChangeObservable, Streamable<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteBuffer, RemoteComparable

    public abstract class RemoteField<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Streamable<T>
    An abstract class of Streamable. Provides all functions of Streamable, that are the same for all Objects to be transmitted in StarMade.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean forcedClientSending
      If set to true, this RemoteField will always be kept in synch with the server.
      protected boolean keepChanged
      Returned by keepChanged().
      protected org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote.NetworkChangeObserver observer
      The NetworkChangeObserver to be notified of actions of this RemoteField
      boolean onServer
      If this RemoteField is on the server.

      • setChanged

        public void setChanged(boolean changed)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkChangeObservable

        Specified by:
